CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: View & Edit mode toggle
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users with editing permissions on videos to toggle between View and Edit modes when viewing a Stream video. In View mode users can only view the video. In Edit mode users with edit permission can edit the video metadata such as title, description, chapters, and transcript. The default mode will be View. The View/Edit mode toggle is designed to prevent accidental edits to video metadata.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: View & Edit mode toggle
OldVersion.description: This feature allows users with editing permissions on videos to toggle between View and Edit modes when viewing a Stream video. In View mode users can only view the video. In Edit mode users with edit permission can edit the video metadata such as title, description, chapters, and transcript. The default mode will be View. The View/Edit mode toggle is designed to prevent accidental edits to video metadata.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Empower end users to report inappropriate posts and comments in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Viva Engage users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning posts and comments within Viva Engage conversations. These reported posts are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for designated investigators with the appropriate role-based access control permissions to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We have updated the release phase to the reflect current state.  Additionally, this began rolling out to GA in December 2023 and did not release to Preview.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Empower end users to report inappropriate posts and comments in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Viva Engage users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning posts and comments within Viva Engage conversations. These reported posts are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for designated investigators with the appropriate role-based access control permissions to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We have updated the release phase to the reflect current state.  Additionally, this began rolling out to GA in December 2023 and did not release to Preview.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Share an Update to Outlook with Goal Broadcast
CurrentVersion.description: With "Share an Update," leaders can share updates of their team goals to the members of their organization directly from Viva Goals. Updates are sent to users via email. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Share an Update to Outlook with Goal Broadcast
OldVersion.description: With "Share an Update," leaders can share updates of their team goals to the members of their organization directly from Viva Goals. Updates are sent to users via email. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: View your Microsoft Planner plans and Microsoft To Do lists in the Microsoft 365 Homepage
CurrentVersion.description: Recently accessed plans and lists will now appear in the quick access list on the Microsoft 365 homepage, helping users more quickly discover and take action on their tasks.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: View your Microsoft Planner plans and Microsoft To Do lists in the Microsoft 365 Homepage
OldVersion.description: Recently accessed plans and lists will now appear in the quick access list on the Microsoft 365 homepage, helping users more quickly discover and take action on their tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New calendar views on Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The calendar on Teams Rooms on Android gets a new look and expanded functionalities. Users can view the calendar for the current and next day. Any available 11 minute or more time slots are shown. A visual indicator (green/purple vertical bar) is added to each time slot for users to easily see whether a room is booked or available. Available in all Teams Rooms licenses.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New calendar views on Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description: The calendar on Teams Rooms on Android gets a new look and expanded functionalities. Users can view the calendar for the current and next day. Any available 11 minute or more time slots are shown. A visual indicator (green/purple vertical bar) is added to each time slot for users to easily see whether a room is booked or available. Available in all Teams Rooms licenses.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved View switcher and Front of Room display controls for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The updated interface for the Teams Rooms on Android View Switcher menu provides end users with more control of the front of room display(s) during a meeting and enables customizations including visibility of the meeting chat and which meeting component is displayed on the left and right panel for Front Row. IT admins can configure the default number of panels and default component on panel(s) using the local device setting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved View switcher and Front of Room display controls for Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description: The updated interface for the Teams Rooms on Android View Switcher menu provides end users with more control of the front of room display(s) during a meeting and enables customizations including visibility of the meeting chat and which meeting component is displayed on the left and right panel for Front Row. IT admins can configure the default number of panels and default component on panel(s) using the local device setting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting protection support on Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Rooms on Android devices apply the Teams Premium meeting security features including end-to-end encryption and sensitivity labels if the meeting organizer has them turned on.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting protection support on Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description:
Teams Rooms on
Android devices apply the Teams Premium meeting security features including
end-to-end encryption and sensitivity labels if the meeting organizer has them
turned on.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Network Analytics
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This new analytics capability helps users understand engagement trends across their entire organization. Network analytics provides an at-a-glance overview of your organization’s top usage trends including employee sentiment, cross-community insights and AI-powered summarization to help you stay up-to-date with all the activity that occurs within your company.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Network Analytics
OldVersion.description:
,
This new analytics capability helps users understand engagement trends across their entire organization. Network analytics provides an at-a-glance overview of your organization’s top usage trends including employee sentiment, cross-community insights and AI-powered summarization to help you stay up-to-date with all the activity that occurs within your company.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Conversation Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to conversation analytics will allow users to better understand engagement trends that occur on their posts including employee sentiment on popular conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Conversation Analytics
OldVersion.description: ,Updates to conversation analytics will allow users to better understand engagement trends that occur on their posts including employee sentiment on popular conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive for Sites
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables you to save on costs of storage exceeding the quota limit by archiving the inactive sites in SharePoint. The status has been adjusted to correctly reflect the current status of this feature. We apologize for any confusion.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive for Sites
OldVersion.description: ,The feature enables you to save on costs of storage exceeding the quota limit by archiving the inactive sites in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - recommendations for new policies and policy finetuning
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview DLP overview page will have two new cards: for DLP with 2 Cards that show Analytics with 1-click recommendations: Highlighting the key risk and the option to create a one-click policy to mitigate the risk, and Recommendation to fine tune existing DLP policies to make them effective and reduce alerts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - recommendations for new policies and policy finetuning
OldVersion.description:
,Microsoft
Purview DLP overview page will have two new cards: for DLP with 2 Cards that
show Analytics with 1-click recommendations: Highlighting the key risk and the
option to create a one-click policy to mitigate the risk, and Recommendation to
fine tune existing DLP policies to make them effective and reduce alerts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Admins can provide intent while submitting
CurrentVersion.description: Admins submitting to Microsoft can convey whether they are submitting for a second opinion or they are submitting to convey their confirmation of clean or malicious verdict.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Admins can provide intent while submitting
OldVersion.description: Admins submitting to Microsoft can convey whether they are submitting for a second opinion or they are submitting to convey their confirmation of clean or malicious verdict.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Attack Simulation Training in DoD
CurrentVersion.description: Attack simulation and training (AST) in the Microsoft Defender for Office 365 is an intelligent risk reduction tool, which allows customers to run realistic attack scenarios in their organization, identify vulnerable users, and help drive behavior change through an integrated security awareness training program. It is to be made available in the DoD environment.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Attack Simulation Training in DoD
OldVersion.description: Attack simulation and training (AST) in the Microsoft Defender for Office 365 is an intelligent risk reduction tool, which allows customers to run realistic attack scenarios in their organization, identify vulnerable users, and help drive behavior change through an integrated security awareness training program. It is to be made available in the DoD environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Teams Channels announcements in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: If a Frontline worker (FLW) licensed user is @mentioned in a Teams channel announcement, the announcement will be displayed in Viva Connections so that the user can find all their important updates in a single place.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Teams Channels announcements in Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: If a Frontline worker (FLW) licensed user is @mentioned in a Teams channel announcement, the announcement will be displayed in Viva Connections so that the user can find all their important updates in a single place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Improved issue details for service health
CurrentVersion.description:
We are introducing a new version of the service health issue details pane (the surface that appears when you click on a service incident or service advisory to view details).

The new version substantially reduces the amount of duplicated text and brings key information forward with improved formatting.  This gives you quicker access to the information you need, reducing the time and effort required to get up to speed on service incident details.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Improved issue details for service health
OldVersion.description:
We are introducing a new version of the service health issue details pane (the surface that appears when you click on a service incident or service advisory to view details).

The new version substantially reduces the amount of duplicated text and brings key information forward with improved formatting.  This gives you quicker access to the information you need, reducing the time and effort required to get up to speed on service incident details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings and make calls on Android Auto
CurrentVersion.description: Teams on Android Auto lets you easily join meetings from the calendar view, quickly call your speed dial contacts and see your recent calls on your Android phones.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings and make calls on Android Auto
OldVersion.description: Teams on Android Auto lets you easily join meetings from the calendar view, quickly call your speed dial contacts and see your recent calls on your Android phones.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Granular Add-ins availability control from education Office Store
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, education tenant administrators will be able to manage the availability of Add-ins from the Office store at a more granular level. We will provide three options—Non-adult student, Adult student, and Faculty and staff—under Microsoft admin center > Org Settings > User owned apps and services > Let users access the Office store. The options are based on the user's role and age group properties.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Granular Add-ins availability control from education Office Store
OldVersion.description: With this feature, education tenant administrators will be able to manage the availability of Add-ins from the Office store at a more granular level. We will provide three options—Non-adult student, Adult student, and Faculty and staff—under Microsoft admin center > Org Settings > User owned apps and services > Let users access the Office store. The options are based on the user's role and age group properties.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Copy simulation action in Attack Simulation Training
CurrentVersion.description: Using the copy simulation action button, Attack simulation administrators will be able to effortlessly duplicate existing simulations and make necessary edits to introduce fresh and tailored simulation scenarios.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Copy simulation action in Attack Simulation Training
OldVersion.description: Using the copy simulation action button, Attack simulation administrators will be able to effortlessly duplicate existing simulations and make necessary edits to introduce fresh and tailored simulation scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open Teams app content in multi-window stageview
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams enables you to open your app content in new multi-window experiences. Unlock multi-tasking workflows for your users inside Teams. Allow them to engage with content and conversation, side-by-side.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open Teams app content in multi-window stageview
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams enables you to open your app content in new multi-window experiences. Unlock multi-tasking workflows for your users inside Teams. Allow them to engage with content and conversation, side-by-side.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: See multiple participants and shared content preview in improved presenter window when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: When sharing the screen or content, the presenter will now be able to better keep track of the participants' activity during a meeting. The Improved Presenter Window shows up to four meeting participants (both video and audio), who are active speakers and who raised hands, as well as a preview of the content being shared. Meeting notifications appear in the middle of the screen for better visibility.  This gives presenters increased confidence and awareness of what is happening among participants during a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Video clip in channel
CurrentVersion.description: You can now use Teams video clip in channel, in addition to chat. Record yourself, your screen, or an audio-only clip and attach the video clip to your channel post or reply.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Contact lists
CurrentVersion.description: The new Outlook for Mac is adding support for Contact lists (aka Personal Distribution Lists).

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Contact lists
OldVersion.description:
The new Outlook for Mac is
adding support for Contact lists (aka Personal Distribution Lists).
